meanings.definition: A wild goat found in the mountains of India and Nepal.
meanings.sent1: The thar gracefully climbed the rocky mountain slope.
meanings.sent2: I saw a thar while hiking in the Himalayas.
meanings.sent3: The thar playfully butted heads with another goat.
meanings.sent4: The thar stood proudly on the cliff, surveying its domain.
meanings.sent5: The thar's surefootedness on the steep terrain was impressive.

meanings.definition: To go or move in a specified direction.
meanings.sent1: I will thar towards the market to buy groceries.
meanings.sent2: The train will thar southward towards the city.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel decided to thar up the tree instead of down.
meanings.sent4: The river tharred steadily towards the sea.
meanings.sent5: The ants tharred in a straight line towards their nest.

meanings.sent1: The thar loomed majestically in the distance.
meanings.sent2: Explorers often venture into the thar for adventure.
meanings.sent3: The thar seemed to challenge climbers with its steep peaks.
meanings.sent4: Legends speak of hidden treasures within the thar.
meanings.sent5: The thar's beauty was breathtaking under the setting sun.
